reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, with one noting its beautiful details in the kaftan, and appreciate its rich purple color and luxurious feel. The dress receives positive feedback for its fit, with one customer mentioning it's great for tall curvy or larger women, and customers find it comfortable. While the material quality receives mixed reviews, with some finding it nice while others say it's not cotton as advertised, customers report the dress runs very big and is a little long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eleganteâ€™!!
items.body: I love this dress! The pictures donâ€™t show the beauty of it fully. It has a nice flow, soft & silky. the crystals are sparkly and bring a lot to this dress. Itâ€™s a timeless piece. Can be worn for any formal occasion and it makes for a must have in wardrobe. Mine was bought for a funeral and I got it just barely on time but I got it as promised. Doesnâ€™t have to be ironed so the beauty in convenience is priceless. I would size down because thereâ€™s plenty of room to accommodate for larger person with the attachments inside. Can wear loose or with attachments for tighter fit. Non see through. I canâ€™t say enough about this gorgeous dress you. Itâ€™s a must have for your wardrobe. Itâ€™s floor length which is perfect for me, I am tall girl and my religious demands for modesty. Price perfect. â¤ï¸ Iâ€™ve read some reviews regarding the crystals falling off etc, Iâ€™ve machine washed & dried mine and I havenâ€™t lost any so far. The straps inside is adjustable so it can be worn tightened or flowing. Remember every body is different shapes & sizes so how it looks on one person may vary from the picture. I love it and will be making another purchase in all available colors. My 8 year old wants me now so I am going to have one altered for her. God blessðŸ™ Read more

items.body: This dress is for plus size womenâ€™s and it doesnâ€™t come with a headband. So donâ€™t expect one when you get it. And itâ€™s for tall peoples has dresses too long for my mom. I put the picture of the back of the dress because I didnâ€™t want my momâ€˜s face showing. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very good dress for a wedding and special elegant looking events.
items.body: Very very very good quality and look . Quick surprising overnight delivery if you need right away. Material is non revealing, which I prefer, as an older woman. I am overly please with this dress. One thing to note, I am 5 ft 1, I will have to get the length alter, even in my heels, I am tripping over the bottom. Read more
items.author: Judy M Robinson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Boxy Fit on Slender Frame
items.body: This would be nice if it wasnâ€™t so huge. They were very generous with the fabric, so itâ€™s perfect for full-figured, voluptuous frames. It swallowed me and there was no way to make it flattering. It hung off my shoulders very loosely, it was just boxy. Very unflattering. I also think itâ€™s a bit pricey. It does have a good weight to it and the rhinestones down the front are beautiful. Overall, it is a nice caftan but keep in mind if youâ€™re son the slender or small size, you may want to choose another optio. Read more
items.author: Camille

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: Gorgeous dress. I want to compliment the sellers integrity. I ordered the dress for a special celebration but it didnt come on time and I ultimately had to wear something else. However, the seller sent me the dress back after I requested a refund for the delay in time. I thought that gesture was compassionate and showed good character. The dress is stunning and I am looking forward to wearing when the special occasion presents! Read more
items.author: Sunnysweetlips

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White-87ï¼ˆwith Inner Belt Versionï¼‰, Gold, Navyblue-87ï¼ˆwith Inner Belt Versionï¼‰, Lightblue390, White, White679, Blue, Purple, Black, Red-87ï¼ˆwith Inner Belt Versionï¼‰, Gold390, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
